kyc_note_3: Photo must not be a screenshot
kyc_note_5: Please make sure that your photo including your face and your ID/Passport stays in the middle of the frame, has a proper brightness and sharpness to prevent identification errors from the system
kyc_type_accept_tos: By click on this checkbox, I agree with Nami's terms of services and accept my personal information to be used by Nami.
kyc_note_6: Please use bank account which has the same name as on your ID/Passport.
kyc_upload_id_front: Upload the front of your ID
kyc_upload_id_back: Upload the back of your ID
kyc_upload_face_photo_note: Upload a photo including your full face and your ID/Passport
kyc_pending_message: Please standby while your identity verification request is being verified by our teams in a short period of time. Our system will inform you through email and mobile application after your identity is verified successfully.
kyc_upload_img_error_msg: An unexpected error occurred while uploading your image, please try again later.
kyc_submit_error_msg: You need to upload all the images before you can send verification request.
kyc_approve_title: Your account has been verified successfully
kyc_approve_message: You now can start trading on Nami
kyc_app_title: Please use the Nami Exchange app to finish the photo verification
kyc_app_qr: Scan the QR code to download Nami Exchange
